snippet.title: Thou shalt Not Kill Official Release Trailer
snippet.description:
"Thou Shalt Not Kill" is a short VHS-style first-person walking simulator horror game. You play the role of Angel a girl who is traveling in the forest and found a VHS tape lying on the ground, she start watching it, only to discover the footage is unsettling and have a mysterious story. You watch the whole footage just to conclude that this is not an ordinary vhs footage. But shock by the discovery you unfold.

This game offers a tense atmosphere and heart-pounding vibes that will surely make you nervous while playing. It includes 3d surroundsound audio to fully immerse you to the scene, A realistic graphics, Creepy enemy design, Realistic dynamic flashlight system and overall spook vibes.

DOWNLOAD NOW:
https://solitarystudios.itch.io/thou-shalt-not-kill-full-game
